document.masterDocTitle: Survey of the semiaquatic bugs (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerromorpha) from Alagoas and Sergipe, Northeast Brazil

bibRefCitation.author: Champion, G. C.
bibRefCitation.refString: Champion, G. C. (1898) Hemiptera - Heteroptera. Biologia Centrali-Americana. Rhynchota, 2, 1 - 416.

subSubSection.paragraph: Geographical distribution: Belize ( Drake & Harris 1935b ), Brazil ( Bacon 1956 ), Cayman Islands ( Hungerford 1940 ), Colombia ( Bacon 1956 ), Costa Rica ( Hungerford 1939 ), Ecuador ( Gould 1931 ), Guatemala ( Drake & Harris 1935b ), Honduras ( Drake & Harris 1927 ), Mexico ( Champion 1898 ), Nicaragua ( University of California, Berkeley 2009 ), Peru ( Drake & Harris 1935b ), Trinidad & Tobago ( Hynes 1948 ), Venezuela ( Hungerford 1944 ).
